alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lititz, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Ephrata, Lititz, Cornwall, Akron, Newmanstown, Lebanon South, Richland, Brickerville, Schaefferstown, Quentin, Kleinfeltersville, Schoeneck and Penryn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
